articles.title: Davidson men's basketball coach Bob McKillop announces retirement after 33 seasons
articles.description: Davidson coach Bob McKillop is retiring after 33 seasons at the North Carolina school. He will be replaced by his son Matt, who has been an assistant with the team since 2008.
articles.content:
Bob McKillop is retiring after 33 seasons as Davidson's head coach, he announced on Friday.
McKillop's son, Matt, who played at Davidson and has been an assistant coach under his father for the last… [+2819 chars]

articles.title: Texas Longhorns slugger Ivan Melendez wins Dick Howser Trophy as college baseball's top player
articles.description: Texas' Ivan Melendez, who leads the nation with 32 home runs and 94 RBI, won the Dick Howser Trophy on Friday as the outstanding player in college baseball.
articles.content:
OMAHA, Neb. -- National home run leader Ivan Melendez of Texas won the Dick Howser Trophy on Friday as the outstanding player in college baseball.

articles.title: Davidson to retire Stephen Curry's No. 30 in August ceremony following Golden State Warriors star's graduation
articles.description: Stephen Curry's No. 30 will be the first number retired by Davidson, which will celebrate arguably the school's best player ever during an Aug. 31 ceremony.

articles.title: Phil Mickelson cards 3-over-73 Friday, but misses U.S. Open cut at 11-over
articles.description: After struggling during first-round play on Thursday, Phil Mickelson played better Friday carding a 3-over-73 but it wasn't enough to make the cut at The Country Club in Brookline.
articles.content: BROOKLINE, Mass. - The good news for Phil Mickelson, after he limped off the ninth green at The Country Club outside Boston on Friday, is that he won't have to worry about making the cut in his next … [+2583 chars]

articles.title: Source -- Former Tennessee Gov. Bill Haslam to gradually buy Predators
articles.description: Former Tennessee Governor Bill Haslam is joining the ownership group of the Nashville Predators with the intention of becoming the franchise's lead owner, sources confirmed to ESPN on Friday.
articles.content:
Former Tennessee governor Bill Haslam will become the new owner of the NHL's Nashville Predators "over a period of years," an NHL source tells ESPN.

articles.title: Former NASCAR driver Clint Bowyer struck and killed pedestrian in highway accident
articles.description: Former NASCAR driver Clint Bowyer struck and killed a pedestrian on a highway in Missouri earlier this month, police said. Bowyer showed no signs of impairment at the time of the accident.
articles.content:
LAKE OZARK, Mo. -- Former NASCAR driver and Fox Sports analyst Clint Bowyer struck and killed a pedestrian on a highway in southwest Missouri earlier this month, police said.

articles.title: NFL fines Ron Rivera $100K, docks Washington Commanders two 2023 OTA practices
articles.description: The NFL has fined Washington Commanders coach Ron Rivera $100,000 and docked the team two 2023 OTA practices due to excessive contact in practice drills.

articles.title: Vince McMahon steps aside as WWE chairman, CEO amid investigation into alleged hush money payment
articles.description: Vince McMahon is stepping aside from his role as CEO and chairman of World Wrestling Entertainment during an investigation into alleged hush money he agreed to pay to a former employee over an alleged affair.
